sentence: Mandela Barnes, who is seeking to become the state's first Black senator; Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry; state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson.
author: SCOTT BAUER / AP
title: Wisconsin Republican Sen. Ron Johnson Will Seek Reelection

title: Ron Johnson unifies Republicans at state convention as they remain split over issues and other candidates
